verbs.description: [V: romania] 40 million anti - gay referendum was a complete flopromania 40 million anti - gay referendum was a complete flop just over 20 percent of romanians bothered to turn out for a referendum held over two days at the weekend to change the constitution to define marriage as strictly between a man and a woman the low turn - out comes as a bitter disappointment to right - wing religious groups who demanded the 40 million referendum to romania orthodox church family coalition 40 40 million
